name: Add Channels contacts from incoming calls to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new rows
description: Every time a incoming call occurs in Channels, Make will automatically add contact from that call to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1sdjT3oX_-rfuWZLyoZ-t30wgYyx9d18Jr7UMWx1p8Eg/edit?usp=sharing).
